entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Temperature: -0.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
